cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:

This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)131f0b0052203ddd6d945788d1ba39415c9f8df90df84324e4dc4642af2f63bc%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)5f6b2a722c887f06e6bbca4ff0da5ff26b03e4301dc1ba2395f9f5e6f870f69d%}.
